fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Perform the Factional Kill
- Forcefully upgrade the Factional attack value. (Costs 5 gold +2 for each current attack level above Basic)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While you are alive, whenever a Civilization kills a player with an attack value higher than the current Factional Kill value, the attack value of the Factional Kill is raised to match the attack value of the deceased.
- Whenever a Civilization kills a player with a Rampage ability, the Factional Kill becomes Rampage.
- Whenever a Civilization kills a player with an Astral ability, the Factional Kill becomes Astral.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value: “They were stabbed by a Zulu Impi.” (Factional Kill)
